column1: echo ¦apt-get¦-qq install xvfb lsof bzip2 elasticsearch postfix > /dev/null ; echo 'transport_maps = hash:/etc/postfix/transport' >> /etc/postfix/main.cf; echo '* discard:' > /etc/postfix/transport ; ln -sf /usr/share/zoneinfo/America/Los_Angele... :: Filesystem_operation

echo ¦echo¦"mysql-server-5.7 mysql-server/root_password password" | debconf-set-selections ; echo "mysql-server-5.7 mysql-server/root_password_again password" | debconf-set-selections ; apt-get -qq install mysql-server mysql-client > /dev/null :: Filesystem_operation

echo ¦echo¦"mysql soft nofile 16384" >> /etc/security/limits.conf; echo "mysql hard nofile 16384" >> /etc/security/limits.conf; echo "mysql soft nproc 4096" >> /etc/security/limits.conf; echo "mysql hard nproc 4096" >> /etc/security/limits.conf;... :: Filesystem_operation
echo ¦useradd¦magento -s /bin/bash -m -d /home/magento; echo "magento ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD: ALL" > /etc/sudoers.d/magento; echo -e "123123q\\n123123q" | passwd magento :: Filesystem_operation

echo ¦echo¦'NODENAME=rabbit@localhost' > /etc/rabbitmq/rabbitmq-env.conf; /usr/sbin/rabbitmq-plugins enable rabbitmq_management; echo -e 'rabbitmq soft nofile 16384\\nrabbitmq hard nofile 16384' >> /etc/security/limits.conf; echo '/usr/sbin/rabbi... :: Filesystem_operation
echo ¦echo¦$TZ | tee /etc/timezone; dpkg-reconfigure --frontend noninteractive tzdata; rm /bin/sh; ln -s /bin/bash /bin/sh :: Filesystem_operation
